title.value: information for Edoovillages (schools, project partner, receiver of laptop donations)

body.value:
Labdoo.org uses
educational software suitable for children of all ages (pre-school, primary, secondary school and high-school)
add-ons for barrier-free access for blind or handicapped users
Offline Wikis and manuals, so children can learn from educational content without having internet connection and
virus scanner ClamAV and other tools.
There is much coming with a Labdoo laptop than described in this wiki, much more than the operating system Lubuntu contains. By installing the prepared Labdoo images for Cloning (Parted Magic / Clonezilla) or der Installation scripts eyou can add much more useful content for the children.
Parts of this wiki this are based on text and graphics taken from www.edubuntu.org and http://wiki.ubuntuusers.de/Edubuntu.
